trans-unit.source: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has failed.
trans-unit.target: Inserido em uma página da Web como um espaço reservado quando a tentativa de carregar ou criar uma nova instância de um dinâmico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle falhou.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that could not be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: A classe ErrorWebPart é usada pelo controle Web Parts definido como um espaço reservado para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle não pôde ser adicionado à página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method, and inserts an ErrorWebPart control in place of the control that failed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle tenta carregar ou criar uma nova instância de um dinâmico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle em uma zona e o tentativa falhar por algum motivo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A>método e insere um ErrorWebPart controlar em vez do controle que falhou.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users.
trans-unit.target: O controle ErrorWebPart é inserido para preservar preexistentes personalização informações de estado que podem ter existido em um controle para os usuários.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose there is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que haja um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle que tem uma propriedade personalizable, para que os usuários possam salvar seus próprios código postal e, em seguida, o controle pode exibir automaticamente informações sobre o tempo para que o código postal sempre que o usuário visita a página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved.
trans-unit.target: Se em algum momento ocorrer um problema com o controle de tempo para que ele não pode ser carregado durante uma solicitação específica e ainda o restante da página carregado com êxito, os dados de personalização personalizado que um usuário tiver salvo para que controle seriam perdido na próxima vez em que os dados de personalização para a página é salva.

trans-unit.source: By inserting the ErrorWebPart control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected.
trans-unit.target: Inserindo o controle ErrorWebPart no lugar do controle com falha, você pode notificar o usuário que ocorreu um problema e também fornecem um mecanismo para o controle de Web Parts definido para preservar os dados de personalização do usuário no controle com falha até que o problema pode ser corrigido.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types.
trans-unit.target: A classe ErrorWebPart deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>da classe, como um dos vários tipos projetados para ser temporários espaços reservados para outros tipos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses its public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma instância da classe, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle usa seu público <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object if present.
trans-unit.target: O construtor requer vários detalhes do controle a ser passado a ele, como a ID, o tipo original do controle com falha (se o controle de falhas é um servidor ou controle de usuário é encapsulado em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>objeto), o caminho original para o arquivo de origem para o controle (se o controle de falhas é um controle de usuário) e a ID de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>objeto se estiver presente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class has a single public property called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A classe ErrorWebPart tem uma única propriedade pública chamada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores podem atribuir um valor para essa propriedade que será exibida em uma página da Web quando o controle é inserido.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class has three protected methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe ErrorWebPart tem três métodos protegidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes style characteristics from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains the control that failed to load.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A>método usa as características de estilo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A>de objeto para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>zona que contém o controle que não pôde ser carregado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the ErrorWebPart control.
trans-unit.target: Se as configurações de estilo existirem neste objeto, o método os aplica ao controle ErrorWebPart.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets several important inherited properties on the ErrorWebPart control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A>método define várias propriedades herdadas importantes no controle ErrorWebPart, para impedir que usuários Personalizando o controle ocultando, minimizando, editar, ou exportá-lo ou alterando seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the value of the string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A>método codifica o valor da cadeia de caracteres de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>propriedade, para evitar problemas de processamento ou ataques de script.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>controlar quando ele falha na tentativa de carregar ou criar uma instância de um dinâmico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Controles dinâmicos são controles que são adicionados a uma página programaticamente ou por um usuário que adiciona o controle de um catálogo de controles, em vez de controles estáticos que são declarados na marcação de uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.
trans-unit.target: O método ErrorWebPart simplesmente cria uma instância da classe base, transmitindo a ele os quatro parâmetros que contêm informações sobre o controle com falha.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é a ID de controle (não a ID exclusiva) do controle com falha.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controle está envolvido em falha, a ID é a ID do controle de servidor seu filho.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <xref:System.Type> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é o nome do <xref:System.Type>do controle com falha.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controle está envolvido na falha, o nome do tipo é o tipo de controle de servidor seu filho.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho para um controle de usuário, se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controle que contém um controle de usuário filho está envolvida em falha.

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que retorna a ID de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controlar, se esse tipo de controle foi envolvido em uma falha ao carregar ou criar um controle.

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é necessário para controles que não herdam a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> classe base.

trans-unit.source: Applies special error style attributes to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"></xref> object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica atributos de estilo de erro especial para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"> </xref> objeto que é inserido em uma página no lugar de outro controle.

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método AddAttributesToRender usa as características de estilo (se houver) que são definidos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A>de objeto para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>zona que contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The styles are applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: Os estilos são aplicados para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>controle antes da renderização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the HTML output to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém o HTML de saída a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Sets several important properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"></xref> control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.
trans-unit.target: Define várias propriedades importantes sobre o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"> </xref> controle antes da renderização, para impedir que usuários personalizem o controle.

trans-unit.source: The EndLoadPersonalization method sets properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: O método EndLoadPersonalization define propriedades em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>controlar antes que ela seja processada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades impedir que os usuários ocultem, minimizando, edição, ou exportando o controle ou alterando seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, users can close or delete an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control instance.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os usuários podem fechar ou excluir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>instância de controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a mensagem de erro é exibida em uma página da Web no lugar de um controle que não puderam ser adicionado com êxito para a página.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorMessage property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted into a page.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ErrorMessage pode ser atribuída um valor por um desenvolvedor, para que seja exibida uma mensagem de erro personalizada no ponto em que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>controle é inserido em uma página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto da mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a culture-specific error message.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma mensagem de erro específica da cultura.

trans-unit.source: Encodes the string value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage*> property.
trans-unit.target: Codifica o valor de cadeia de caracteres da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage*>

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents method encodes the string assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderContents codifica a cadeia de caracteres atribuída para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>propriedade para garantir que ele renderiza corretamente e para proteger contra ataques de injeção de script.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that encodes the error message.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que codifica a mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método é adicionado somente para implementar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método é adicionado somente para implementar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> interface e chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization*>

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método é adicionado somente para implementar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle rastreia o status de suas alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle de Web Parts é responsável por determinar quando o controle é considerado alterado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
